root.name: The Sims 2: IKEA Home Stuff
root.description: Overview The Sims 2: Ikea Stuff adds all new contemporary furnishings to your Sims homes. These stylish new items range from couches, chairs, and coffee tables, to lights, plants and even pillows. Every item in The Sims 2: ikea Stuff is an actual item for purchase at a real life IKEA store. The pack contains several different collections of featured IKEA furniture lines showing off the furniture maker's signature style.
